title: Le bleu perdu
creator_credit: Paul Driessen, Pierre Moretti and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated cartoon envisaging the kind of world that children of the future may well inherit when the last vestige of blue is blotted out from the sky by the spreading mantle of smog. In this story a little boy set out to find the blue sky he has been told of. A film without word.
